summary: Game save stuck in Werewolf form next to Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Random bug and my character became stuck in Werewolf form, enjoy your meal in Whiterun!
I tested this over 14th minutes and my character still a Werewolf. 
This bug appears when I entered in the Hob\'s fall cave as a Werewolf.

Install
Copy the save in your Skyrim\'s save folder, usually \"C:\\Users\\%username%\\Documents\\MyGames\\Skyrim\\\" with Windows 7.
Load the save called InfiniteWerewolf.

Endorse Me if you like it.

Thanks for the comments
author: Batou
